main event: Observation of a cloudlike object that appeared solid, appeared stationary, broke into parts, flew erratic, glowed solid lights, golden similar to red-gold sun. Disappeared over horizon, appeared again, then banner with solid object at end of it.
interesting points: The object appeared solid with sun shining on it, and the witness described it as fitting the description of 5/c material.
The object exhibited erratic movement, breaking into parts and varying in brightness.
The object was observed over a period of 10 minutes as it disappeared over the horizon, reappeared, and had a banner-like object at the end of it.
The witness felt the object was likely some type of unconventional or experimental aircraft being tested in the area.
The report includes sketches showing the location and movement of the object relative to the witness.
sighted object: cloudlike object that appeared solid, broke into parts, flew erratic, glowed solid lights
